title: Lesson 88
paragraph: Persuasion and integration involve influencing others and combining elements effectively. Tidy planning and proper guidance ensure smooth adoption of ideas.

words.meaning: to convince someone to do or believe something
words.example: She persuaded him to join the team.
The module is integrateful with existing software.

words.meaning: to reduce to the smallest possible
words.example: They minimalized risks before starting the project.

words.meaning: able to be included in a budget
words.example: The new plan is budgetable within this fiscal year.

words.meaning: able to be directed or influenced
words.example: The robot is guideable via remote control.

words.meaning: to put into a manual or instructions
words.example: The procedure was manualized for staff training.

words.meaning: able to be suspected or doubted
words.japaneseMeaning: 疑わしい、疑いがかけられる
words.example: The document is suspectable due to inconsistencies.
The elders in the community advised the youth.

words.japaneseMeaning: 喜ばせることができる
words.example: The show was delightable to the audience.

words.meaning: able to be cleaned or organized
words.example: The desk is tidyable in a few minutes.
